This is an example blog post.

You can edit this post by modifying the file called `blog/20141010-AnExampleBlogPost.Rmd` and then restarting the app.

You can try adding more `.rmd` files to the directory to create several blog posts. In contrast, if you remove all the `.rmd` files from the `blog` directory, the blog button will disappear from the top menu of your site.
